S.FORM: alang miyamay ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Ci'an go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 2,924 buwan, 7,823 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 13 kyan ku 1,023 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 87 kyan ku 6,800 hi nya. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na miyamay hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na miyamay hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na miyamay hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na miyamay hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na miyamay hya' ga Sirakesay. tay 'llaw na miyamay hya' ga Buner. tay 'zil na miyamay hya' ga Ciyibangcalay.
